title: Request Your Detailed Quote
description: Complete the following steps so we can provide you with an accurate estimate.

selection.title: Choose the type of quote you need
selection.description: A quick quote will give you a general idea of the cost, while a detailed quote will allow us to refine the estimate much more. Remember that all quotes are estimates and a technician will contact you to confirm them.

simple.title: Quick Quote
simple.description: Ideal for getting a quick cost estimate for your project with minimal data.

detailed.title: Detailed Quote
detailed.description: Provide all the details to get a more accurate preliminary budget tailored to your needs.

simple.title: Quick Quote Form
simple.description: Fill in the following fields to get an approximate estimate.

summary.title: Summary of Your Request
summary.description: Please review all the details to ensure they are correct before submitting your request. A specialist will contact you to refine the details.

confirmation.title: Request Received!
confirmation.description: Thank you for completing your request. Our team will review it and contact you within the next 24-48 hours.
